ygData.messageBody:
According to Mike Browne:
> No it won't. I participated in a Guild war and killed two PCs and suffered a
> faction hit. I can no longer purchase items in Felwithe as a result. Bug
> still exists in program.

It think that Wizard <wizard@...> was saying that faction hits
outside of an arena, duel or guild war situation would be fine, not
that they are. Which basically means: faction hits only for PvP players,
not players that have "temporary" PvP.

As if this would encourage people to switch to PvP :)
